About Me

Let me tell you a little about me and what I do...

Hello there! I am Tushar Tevetia, an Electrical Engineer by degree and Computer Engineer by experience. I have done my Graduation from ABES Engineering College Ghaziabad, U.P. Working gives me a lot of skills and experience and that's why I always look forward to learn more. I am currently working with a MNC as a Project Engineer. I have fundamental knowledge of C language, SQL, Linux and Python, and my Front end skills include HTML5, CSS, Javascript and ReactJs. Working in a real time project has helped me in improving my backend skills. My objective is to get an opportunity in the field of Frontend where I can polish my skills and make the best of my potential and contribute to the organization's growth.
